p: The content of copper, nickel, cobalt, iron magnesium cations and of the exchange cations of potassium, sodium in the solutions was determined by atomic absorption spectroscopy using the AA-6300 «Shimadzu» (Japan) [23] using WizAArd software operating on a personal computer. Calcium was titrated with 2Na-EDTA (Ethylenediamine-N,N,N’N’-tetraacetic acid, disodium salt). All the data reported are the mean of three replicates.
